resources.string: No sub-folders here. Go back and try again.

Welcome

Dropbox Folder Gallery quickly and efficiently shows the images in a selected folder and its sub-folders in your online Dropbox storage.

The official Dropbox application photo provides an adequate gallery view of all photos in all folders. Please note this refined Dropbox Folder Gallery application is not affiliated with Dropbox in any way.

Permissions

On first run you will be prompted to login to your Dropbox account using a browser. Then when prompted again please grant permission for the Dropbox FolderGallery profile to have read access your Dropbox folders and files. Read only access is needed to safely navigate your Dropbox folders and files.

No special Android permissions are required for Android 10 and newer to download original images. For older Android versions photos, media and file access is needed to add downloaded images to the device.

There is a bug in Android 6 reporting Overlay Permissions found - just keep re-trying until the file permission works without the overlay message. Another Android 7 bug means use an alternative viewer. eg Gallery or Downloads.

Navigation

The folders screen lists the folders in your dropbox top level. The Play button beside the folder name starts the display of image thumbnails below that folder. Click on a folder name to reveal its sub-folders. If a fast forward button appears please click to load more folders.

The spanner icon selects administration tools. Here you can delete cache files, and disconnect your dropbox.

The Gallery screen downloads small thumbnails in batches. Thumbnails can be sorted by file time, folder name, and file names. File names are truncated to 10 characters which is enough to distiguish a standard day date of format yyyy-mm-dd. Scroll the thumbnails up or down to see all the images.

Click on a image to download the full version into the gallery storage. The image is actually placed in a special gallery album called "Dropbox Folder Gallery". Long click a thumbnail to check the image details in your dropbox storage.

Terms

Please ensure that before using this application that you expressly understand and agree that your use of this application is at your sole risk and that the application is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranty of any kind, to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.

Once the applicable is available to you through your google account, you should check the application as soon as reasonably possible to ensure that it functions and performs as stated, and notify us or Provider as soon as reasonably possible if you find any errors or defect. See the Google Play Refund Policy for more information.
Administration Options\n\nTouch clean cache files to all temporary files. Note that images will not be removed from your device gallery
Touch disconnect dropbox to end the connection to your dropbox. Restart Dropbox Folder Gallery to reconnect or choose another dropbox
